article: It's Jim's birthday today. He is five years old. He gets many nice birthday presents from his family and one of them is a big drum . " Who gives him the drum? his father asks. " His grandfather does, answers Jim's mother. Jim likes his drum very much. He makes a noise with it, but his mother doesn't say anything about it. His father is not at home. He is working in a school. So he doesn't hear the noise. But one of the neighbours doesn't like the noise at all. So one morning she takes a knife and goes into Jim's room. Jim is making a noise with the drum. She says to him, " Hello, Jim. Do you know there is something nice in your drum? Here's a knife. Open the drum and let's find it.
questions: Which of the following is right?
options: to open the drum with the knife
to make a noise with the drum
Something is wrong with Jim's father's ears.
There's a nice present in the drum.
Jim's mother doesn't stop the noise.
